_metadata._comment: category-registry.json — Maps category IDs to their individual config files.
_metadata._comment_2: The app loads this registry first, then loads individual category files on demand.
_metadata._comment_3: Categories are loaded lazily — only when the user navigates to that category.
_metadata._comment_4: Required on startup: only this registry file. Individual category files load on demand.
_metadata._comment_5: To add a new category: create a new category config file and add an entry here.
_metadata._comment_6: category_id must be unique and match the 'id' field inside the category config file.

_comment_load: Options: 'on_demand' | 'eager'. on_demand = load category file only when user taps it. Recommended.
_comment_cache: Once a category file is loaded into memory it stays cached for the session. No repeated disk reads.

categories._comment: Vehicle tasks — MOT, road tax, servicing. DVLA API tasks land here.
Health tasks — medication, vitamins, GP appointments.
Home cleaning tasks — hoovering, laundry, mopping etc.
Bin tasks — put bin out and bring bin in. Bin collection API tasks land here.

_comment_pet: Categories whose visibility is controlled by pets-config.json. None in this initial set.
_comment_hidden: Category IDs that are default_hidden. Empty for this initial set.
